net.algem.planning.fact.services

Class PlanningFactService

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.algem.planning.fact.services.PlanningFactService

  • public class PlanningFactService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class, to perform auditable operation on planning (schedule) instances. Each operation will modify the state of the planning, and stores one or serveral facts according to the operation

      • replanify

        public void replanify(ReplanifyCommand cmd,
             java.lang.String comment)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Replanify a schedule, according to the replanification command. Absence, catchup and replacement facts, will be automatically created from the command, according to the specification
        Parameters:
        cmd - a command that describes which part of the schedule should be updated
        comment - user comment
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
